name: It's a Giant!
description:
[Warning: This game may take a while to load. Just be patient. If nothing happens, try to refresh site. If the sound is delayed, also try to refresh.]

The giant, cyclopic creature has appeared on the island and he's very hungry. With his great size and strength, nothing will be able to stop him from eating inhabitants. Will the giant satisfy his hunger? How much stuff is he going to destroy on his way? What secrets shall he find on the island? All up to you!

"It's a Giant!" is a game, where you play as big guy! Players are allowed to do whatever they want. Eat people, destroy trees...

Oh, and there's a secret ending too!

Controls:

WSAD Keys
MovementSpacePowerful stomp
Shift
Faster movement
EEat item
Mouse Right Click
Pick up item
Mouse Left Click
Drop Item
